title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added support for the `uv` package manager in Dependabot, including conditional documentation and configuration updates.
Enhanced Dependabot guidance by updating links and adding `uv`-specific registry configuration details.
Updated Copilot documentation to include the new `GPT-5.3-Codex` model across various tables and references.
Enabled `@typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any` ESLint rule with exceptions for legacy files.
Merged global fields from `fields.json` into audit log events for consistency.
summary:

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added support for the `uv` package manager in Dependabot, including conditional documentation and configuration updates.
- Enhanced Dependabot guidance by updating links and adding `uv`-specific registry configuration details.
- Updated Copilot documentation to include the new `GPT-5.3-Codex` model across various tables and references.
- Enabled `@typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any` ESLint rule with exceptions for legacy files.
- Merged global fields from `fields.json` into audit log events for consistency.

### Title
Add UV support and enhance Dependabot guidance, update Copilot models, and refine linting rules
